#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	
	vector<string> v;
	
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		v.push_back(s);
	}	
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		int j=i+1;
		int count=1;
		while(j<t && v[j]==v[i])
		{
			j++;
			count++;
		
		}
		
		cout<<v[i]<<" "<<count<<"\n";	
		i=j-1;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
